name: Opiniodev-rails-app
tagline: Feedback Forum created in rails. It can be easily integrated into your website and you can get instantly support information and ideas from your users.
body:
### Welcome to OpinioDev Forum.
The software is built do offer a simple and nice application for your users to offer feedback on your product. The application is built using Rails & MongoDB. It loads very fast.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
